title: The Trilogy
description: The first three installments of the popular Werecat series are an epic thrill ride from Montréal to New York City to the Caribbean. A Readers' Choice finalist from award-winning fantasy author Andrew J. Peters (The City of Seven Gods). Twenty-two-year-old Jacks is plunged into the hidden world of feline shifters on a lost weekend in Montréal. He emerges with fantastical abilities, but he's also faced with a possessive maker and a wild animal nature he must control if he wants to keep the one man who accepts him for who he is. He's caught between two worlds and soon fighting for survival as a suspect in the gory murders of two men and an enemy of members of his kind who want to destroy man for the atrocities of the past. The Trilogy includes The Rearing (Book One), The Glaring (Book Two), and The Fugitive (Book Three). Also in the Werecat series: The Sim Ru Prophecy (Book Four).
author: Andrew J. Peters
